data.current_description: Read a page of tasks. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
data.summary_suggestion: List tasks with pagination and filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of tasks with customizable properties. Use the `properties` query parameter to specify which task fields to return. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination controls. Returns a page of SimplePublicObject records with the requested properties.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'List' is too generic. Description lacks details about pagination parameters, filtering capabilities, and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies pagination support, property customization, and return type for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Create a task with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard tasks is provided.
data.description_suggestion: Create a new task with the provided properties. Accepts a SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate request containing task properties. Returns the created task as a SimplePublicObject with the assigned ID and all provided properties. The operation generates a unique ID for the new task.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Create' is too vague. Description mentions documentation reference which is not actionable for AI agents. data.current_summary: Read a batch of tasks by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve multiple task objects in a single request by specifying their internal IDs or unique property values. data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a task by ID or unique property
data.reasoning: Summary 'Read' is too generic and doesn't indicate what is being read. Enhanced summary to specify 'task' and clarify the lookup capability by ID or unique property, improving AI agent interpretability for operation selection.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/objects/tasks/{taskId}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary 'Update' is too generic and doesn't specify what object type is being updated or that it's a partial update. Enhanced summary to clarify 'task' and 'partial update' capability, improving AI agent's ability to determine when this operation is appropriate.

data.current_description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{taskId}`. `{taskId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.summary_suggestion: Partially update a task by ID or unique property
data.reasoning: Summary 'Update' is too generic and doesn't specify what object type is being updated or that it's a partial update. Enhanced summary to clarify 'task' and 'partial update' capability, improving AI agent's ability to determine when this operation is appropriate.

data.current_summary: Archive a batch of tasks by ID
data.description_suggestion: Move multiple task objects to the recycling bin in a single batch operation. data.current_summary: Update a batch of tasks by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Perform partial updates on multiple task objects in a single batch operation.
